name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rank Huntr - Amazon Keyword Rank Tracker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track Amazon ranks for different keywords. Get notifications if something happens.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track Amazon ranks for different keywords. Get notifications if something happens.

Track your Amazon product rankings.

How it works:
1. Add ASIN you want to track
2. Add keywords for the ASIN that you want to track
3. When a keyword ranking changes in a significant way, you get notfied.
